ygData.subject: Re: Research Components List (needed)
ygData.msgSnippet: Buy the books from your guild.  They have all the combinations listed.  You will need to up your language skills to read some of them. -Solric of the 4th
ygData.messageBody:
Buy the books from your guild. They have all the combinations listed. You
will need to up your language skills to read some of them.

-Solric of the 4th circle


-----Original Message-----
From: Ziffnab MageStorm [mailto:eq_ziffnab@...]
Sent: Friday, May 21, 1999 10:19 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Research Components List (needed)


From: Ziffnab MageStorm <eq_ziffnab@...>

A while back there was a list of runes needed to make certain spells.
Can anyone repost the website to the list or just post the list here
again. I would greatly appreciate it as I am finding lots of runes now
and want to start my research.

Sincerely,

Ziffnab of Xegony
